name: Keller

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What do you want?

topics.topic_text: Have you seen a guy named Price around?
topics.response_text: We work together. I'm handling his deliveries for the moment while he handles a business opportunity that came up.

topics.topic_text: Brahmin tipping is a cherished pastime.
topics.response_text: What? Look, do you have something to drop off or not?

topics.topic_text: <Draw weapon> You're a dead man.
topics.response_text: Whoa!  Hold on a minute, buddy...

topics.topic_text: Um, well...  Nevermind.
topics.response_text: Crazy wastelander.

topics.topic_text: Close enough.  Yeah, Contreras told me to give Price this package.
topics.response_text: Lets see here...

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> We agreed you should die.
topics.response_text: Contreras will still get his. Killing you will just save me some paperwork.

topics.topic_text: He said he would help you.
topics.response_text: Great. Let him know we'll be keeping an eye on him. He is free to do business...

topics.topic_text: I had no idea that package had chems! Contreras gave it to me!
topics.response_text: Contreras, eh? We suspected he was involved somehow.

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> You'll never take me alive, pig!
topics.response_text: Good. Saves me paperwork.

topics.topic_text: Who the hell are you?
topics.response_text: Ranger Keller. I've been undercover for months tracking chems in this area.

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> You won't be telling anyone about this.
topics.response_text: Heh, an accomplice afterall. Well, it'll save me some paperwork just killing you.

topics.topic_text: Hey, I'm just the messenger. I didn't know anything about this.
topics.response_text: You know what? I believe you.

topics.topic_text: C'mon guy.  You're no merchant.  You've got Ranger all over you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] What?! How the hell did you figure that out?

topics.topic_text: The way you stand, your weapon, even your armor is fitted in a military fashion.
topics.response_text: Hell. Thought I'd done a better job than that. Well, if that's how it is, you can call me Ranger Keller.

topics.topic_text: I'm sure Contreras could work with you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] It might work since he's acting as a major hub for this activity. It's not like he has much choice now that we have evidence.

topics.topic_text: <Give 250 caps> I'm sure Contreras would be willing to work with you...
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I wouldn't normally do this, but seeing so much money change hands between scumbags on a daily basis has me thinking.

topics.topic_text: Just some supplies for McCarran from the Crimson Caravan.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, if you hear anything, report it to myself or Lt. Boyd immediately. We need to track down his source.

topics.topic_text: You might want to ask Contreras at Camp McCarran that question.
topics.response_text: Contreras?! What's his involvement? Was he selling drugs to Price?

topics.topic_text: What's going to happen to him?
topics.response_text: He'll be shot. We have no tolerance for chem dealers in the military.

topics.topic_text: Ok. I'll just be on my way then.
topics.response_text: Stay out of trouble.

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> Well, I can't just let him be killed. Word of this stops here.
topics.response_text: I have Contreras. No one is going to miss you.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Goodbye.

topics.topic_text: <Give 250 caps> Okay, make that 500 caps. I'm sure Contreras can skim for you.
topics.response_text: I wouldn't normally do this, but seeing so much money change hands between scumbags on a daily basis has me thinking.

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> I think I'll just take my caps back from your corpse.
topics.response_text: You really don't know what you just got yourself into, girlie.

topics.topic_text: Well, I was given this package to deliver to him.
topics.response_text: Let's see... Well, it looks like you've got the materials here to make full-blown chems.

topics.topic_text: Son of a...  Sir, I didn't know anything about this.
topics.response_text: You know what? I believe you.

topics.topic_text: Nothing. I was just told he was a local merchant I should check out.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] All right, if you hear anything, report it to myself or Lt. Boyd immediately. We need to track down his source.

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> And now I'm going to kill you, you lying son of a bitch.
topics.response_text: Whoa!  Hold on a minute, buddy...

topics.topic_text: <Draw Weapon> Special delivery!
topics.response_text: Ah, hell!{About to have a surprise gunfight.}

topics.topic_text: Oh... Well, I'll come back when he's around.
topics.response_text: Whatever you say, buddy.

topics.topic_text: No one works for Price, so who the hell are you?
topics.response_text: Ah, shit. Well since you seem to have things figured out, the name's Keller. I'm an NCR Ranger investigating chem runners.

topics.topic_text: You said you were handling Price's goods while he's away?
topics.response_text: Yeah. You need something?

topics.topic_text: Contreras would like to work with you.
topics.response_text: Really now? We had our suspicions about that man, but he's got so many shipments going so many different directions it's been hard to track

topics.topic_text: Leave him alone and he'll share contact information.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] He has himself a deal. However, If he tries to run or he continues to deal strategic assets with enemies, he's a dead man.

topics.topic_text: Don't charge him and he'll help you take down the local dealers.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] He has himself a deal. However, If he tries to run or he continues to deal strategic assets with enemies, he's a dead man.

topics.topic_text: He gave me a package to deliver and now he asked me to kill you.
topics.response_text: Sounds like the evidence we need to bring him in for questioning and search his shack, but why are you telling me all of this?

topics.topic_text: If Contreras is a scumbag, I want him caught.
topics.response_text: Well, thanks for the tip, but we'll need more evidence. Talk to Boyd at McCarran.

description:
Keller is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

Keller is an NCR Ranger operating undercover in Westside, investigating a chem ring with Lt. Boyd.

Keller's Personality: Professional, observant, and cautious. Keller maintains a calm demeanor under pressure and is skilled at deception when necessary.

Keller's Backstory: Keller joined the NCR Rangers several years ago, earning a reputation for his investigative skills and undercover work. In 2281, he was assigned to Westside to infiltrate a chem ring operating in the area. Working with Lt. Boyd, he successfully apprehended the dealer Price, but now poses as Price's associate to maintain cover and gather more intelligence. He's currently stationed at Miguel's Pawn Shop, handling Price's deliveries while his contact remains in custody.
